body_html:
@poxvoculi Thanks for your reply!
Since I am new to NN, there is something I would like to clarify with you.
Since our server does not have enough graphics memory, I reduced the embedding size from 1024 to 512 to fit into memory.
Since training took forever, the one I tested is at about:
global step 150200 learning rate 0.1262 step-time 0.51 perplexity 6.82
eval: bucket 0 perplexity 3.91
eval: bucket 1 perplexity 5.67
eval: bucket 2 perplexity 6.33
eval: bucket 3 perplexity 11.45

All other parameters I use the default.
So does everything look normal?

body:
@poxvoculi Thanks for your reply!
Since I am new to NN, there is something I would like to clarify with you.
Since our server does not have enough graphics memory, I reduced the embedding size from 1024 to 512 to fit into memory.
Since training took forever, the one I tested is at about:
global step 150200 learning rate 0.1262 step-time 0.51 perplexity 6.82
  eval: bucket 0 perplexity 3.91                                      
  eval: bucket 1 perplexity 5.67                                      
  eval: bucket 2 perplexity 6.33                                      
  eval: bucket 3 perplexity 11.45                                     

All other parameters I use the default.
So does everything look normal?
